Reviews.Title: Gateway 17.3 laptop Nv76r38u
Reviews.Author: Marc Arara
Reviews.Content: Big screen, numeric keypad, Windows 8 (not a touchscreen though), Cool red exterior, Nice white interior, easy to clean screen.Cons: keyboard feels a little cheap, trackpad software doesn't gesture like a mac, click on trackpad is a little resistant.Overall great! Had to set it up so I liked it better, especially the trackpad. I use a mouse more now. Battery life 3.5 hours of constantly on.

ProductInfo.Features:
Screen Size: 17.3"
Screen Resolution: 1600 x 900
Processor Type: Intel
Processor Model: Pentium B960
Processor Speed: 2.2GHz
ProductInfo.Name: Gateway 17.3" Laptop 6GB 750GB | Nv76r38u
